Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan aim to bounce back from MCG heartbreak
Zimbabwe will draw confidence from their two white-ball wins against Pakistan in the last two years
Rizwan, who fell for 4 against India at the MCG, has not been dismissed for successive single-digit scores in T20Is since February 2019
Post-Match Reflections: The morale of the boys is high. We are trying to prepare for the next game and come back strong and remain in contention for this World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The forecast in Perth is for partly cloudy conditions but no rain
The pitch has a green tinge and the new ball has swung
Zimbabwe have never beaten Pakistan in an ICC tournament
